00022 // xml Digital SIGnature processing context
00023 
00024 class UTransformCtx {
00025 public:
00026 
00027         // Check for memory error
00028         U_MEMORY_TEST
00029 
00030         // Allocator e Deallocator
00031         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00032         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00033 
00034         // The transform operation mode
00035 
00036         enum Mode {
00037         //      NONE = 0, // mode unknown
00038                 PUSH = 1, // pushing data thru transform
00039                 POP  = 2         // popping data from transform
00040         };
00041 
00042         enum DataType {
00043         //      NONE     = 0x0000, // transform data type is unknown or nor data expected
00044                 BINARY = 0x0001, // binary transform data
00045                 XML      = 0x0002  // xml transform data
00046         };
00047 
00048         // URI transform type bit mask
00049 
00050         enum Uritype {
00051         //      NONE                      = 0x0000, // URI type is unknown or not set
00052                 EMPTY                     = 0x0001, // empty URI ("") type
00053                 SAME_DOCUMENT = 0x0002, // same document ("#...") but not empty ("") URI type
00054                 TYPE_LOCAL        = 0x0004, // local URI ("file:///....") type
00055                 TYPE_REMOTE       = 0x0008, // remote URI type
00056                 TYPE_ANY                  = 0xFFFF  // Any URI type
00057         };
00058 
00059         // COSTRUTTORI
00060 
00061          UTransformCtx()
00062                 {
00063                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTransformCtx, "", 0)
00064 
00065                 uri                     = 0;
00066                 status          = 0;
00067                 xptrExpr                = 0;
00068                 enabledUris = TYPE_ANY;
00069                 }
00070 
00071         ~UTransformCtx()
00072                 {
00073                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UTransformCtx)
00074 
00075                 if (uri) 
00076                         {
00077                         U_SYSCALL_VOID(free, "%p", (void*)uri);
00078                         U_SYSCALL_VOID(free, "%p", (void*)xptrExpr);
00079                         }
00080                 }
00081 
00082 #ifdef DEBUG
00083         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00084 #endif
00085 
00086 protected:
00087         int status;                              // the transforms chain processing status
00088         int enabledUris;                 // the allowed transform data source uri types
00089         const char* uri;                 // the data source URI without xpointer expression
00090         const char* xptrExpr; // the xpointer expression from data source URI (if any)
00091 
00092         UVector<UBaseTransform*> chain;
00093 
00094         static UVector<UString>* enabledTransforms;
00095 
00096         // SERVICES
00097 
00098         bool execute();
00099         bool setURI(const char* uri);
00100         bool nodesListRead(xmlNodePtr node, int usage);
00101         bool verifyNodeContent(UBaseTransform* transform, xmlNodePtr node);
00102 
00103         static void                               registerDefault();
00104         static UBaseTransform* findByHref(const char* href);
00105         static UBaseTransform* nodeRead(xmlNodePtr node, int usage);
00106 
00107 private:
00108         UTransformCtx(const UTransformCtx&)            {}
00109         UTransformCtx& operator=(const UTransformCtx&) { return *this; }
00110 
00111         friend class UDSIGContext;
00112         friend class UReferenceCtx;
00113 };

00122         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00123         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR

00126 
00127          UDSIGContext();

00129

00131 
00132         bool verify(UXML2Document& document);
00133 
00134 #ifdef DEBUG
00135         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00136 #endif
00137 
00138 protected:
00139 //      xmlSecKeyInfoCtx                keyInfoReadCtx;                          // the reading key context
00140 //      xmlSecKeyInfoCtx                keyInfoWriteCtx;                                 // the writing key context (not used for signature verification).
00141 //      xmlSecPtrListPtr                enabledReferenceTransforms; // the list of transforms allowed in <dsig:Reference/> node.
00142 //      xmlSecTransformId               defSignMethodId;                                 // the default signing method klass.
00143 //      xmlSecTransformId               defC14NMethodId;                                 // the default c14n method klass.
00144 //      xmlSecTransformId               defDigestMethodId;                       // the default digest method klass.
00145           
00146 //      xmlSecKeyPtr                    signKey;                                        // the signature key; application may set before calling #xmlSecDSigCtxSign or #xmlSecDSigCtxVerify functions.
00147 //      xmlSecBufferPtr         result;                                 // the pointer to signature (not valid for signature verification).
00148 //      xmlSecTransformPtr      preSignMemBufMethod;    // the pointer to binary buffer right before signature (valid only if FLAGS_STORE_SIGNATURE flag is set).
00149 
00150         int                                                     status;                                  // the <dsig:Signature/> processing status.
00151         int                                                     operation;                               // the operation: sign or verify.
00152         int                                                     enabledReferenceUris; // the URI types allowed for <dsig:Reference/> node.
00153         xmlNodePtr                                      keyInfoNode;                     // the pointer to <dsig:keyInfo/> node.
00154         xmlNodePtr                                      signValueNode;                   // the pointer to <dsig:SignatureValue/> node.
00155         xmlNodePtr                                      signedInfoNode;          // the pointer to <dsig:signedInfo/> node.
00156         const char*                                     id;                                              // the pointer to Id attribute of <dsig:Signature/> node.
00157         UTransformCtx                           transformCtx;                    // the <dsig:SignedInfo/> node processing context.
00158         UBaseTransform*                 signMethod;                              // the pointer to signature transform.
00159         UBaseTransform*                 c14nMethod;                              // the pointer to c14n transform.
00160         UVector<UReferenceCtx*> manifestReferences;      // the list of references in <dsig:Manifest/> nodes.
00161         UVector<UReferenceCtx*> signedInfoReferences; // the list of references in <dsig:SignedInfo/> node.             
00162 
00163         static UDSIGContext* pthis;
00164 
00165         // SERVICES
00166 
00167         bool processKeyInfoNode();
00168         bool processSignedInfoNode();
00169         bool processObjectNode(xmlNodePtr objectNode);
00170         bool processSignatureNode(xmlNodePtr signature);
00171         bool processManifestNode(xmlNodePtr manifestNode);
00172 
00173 private:
00174         UDSIGContext(const UDSIGContext&)            {}
00175         UDSIGContext& operator=(const UDSIGContext&) { return *this; }
00176 
00177         friend class UTransformCtx;
00178         friend class UReferenceCtx;
00179 };
00180 
00181 /* The <dsig:Reference/> processing context
00182  *
00183  * Reference is an element that may occur one or more times. It specifies
00184  * a digest algorithm and digest value, and optionally an identifier of the 
00185  * object being signed, the type of the object, and/or a list of transforms 
00186  * to be applied prior to digesting. The identification (URI) and transforms 
00187  * describe how the digested content (i.e., the input to the digest method) 
00188  * was created. The Type attribute facilitates the processing of referenced 
00189  * data. For example, while this specification makes no requirements over 
00190  * external data, an application may wish to signal that the referent is a 
00191  * Manifest. An optional ID attribute permits a Reference to be referenced 
00192  * from elsewhere
00193  */
00194 
00195 class UReferenceCtx {
00196 public:
00197 
00198         // Check for memory error
00199         U_MEMORY_TEST
00200 
00201         // Allocator e Deallocator
00202         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00203         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00204 
00205         enum Origin {
00206                 MANIFEST,       // reference in <dsig:Manifest> node
00207                 SIGNED_INFO     // reference in <dsig:SignedInfo> node
00208         };
00209 
00210         enum Status {
00211                 UNKNOWN  = 0, // the status is unknow
00212                 SUCCEEDED = 1, // the processing succeeded
00213                 INVALID   = 2   // the processing failed
00214         };
00215 
00216         // COSTRUTTORI
00217 
00218         UReferenceCtx(int org)
00219                 {
00220                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UReferenceCtx, "%d", org)
00221 
00222                 id                               = 0;
00223                 uri                      = 0;
00224                 type                     = 0;
00225                 status           = UNKNOWN;
00226                 origin           = org;
00227                 digestMethod = 0;
00228                 }
00229 
00230         ~UReferenceCtx()
00231                 {
00232                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UReferenceCtx)
00233 
00234                 if (digestMethod) delete digestMethod;  // the pointer to digest transform
00235                 }
00236 
00237 #ifdef DEBUG
00238         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00239 #endif
00240 
00241 protected:
00242         int status;                                                     // the reference processing status
00243         int origin;                                                     // the reference processing transforms context
00244         const char* id;                                 // the <dsig:Reference/> node ID attribute
00245         const char* uri;                                        // the <dsig:Reference/> node URI attribute
00246         const char* type;                                       // the <dsig:Reference/> node Type attribute
00247         UString digest_result;                  // the pointer to digest result
00248         UTransformCtx transformCtx;     // the reference processing transforms context
00249         UBaseTransform* digestMethod;   // the pointer to digest transform
00250 
00251         // SERVICES
00252 
00253         bool processNode(xmlNodePtr node);
00254 
00255 private:
00256         UReferenceCtx(const UReferenceCtx&)            {}
00257         UReferenceCtx& operator=(const UReferenceCtx&) { return *this; }
00258 
00259         friend class UDSIGContext;
00260 };
